ygData.subject: Re: Equipping weapon(s)/shield and instruments
ygData.msgSnippet: I strongly suspect this question stems from lack of experience, so please bear with me. Even if I have hot buttons for my melee weapon and instrument, don t I
ygData.messageBody:
I strongly suspect this question stems from lack of experience, so please
bear with me.
Even if I have hot buttons for my melee weapon and instrument, don't I have
to still drag either item to my melee slot on my inventory screen to be
using it? How can a hot key speed this process up?

Any assistance would be appreciated.

Journeyman Plastos
Looking forward to getting his first instrument
and using the aforementioned trick

At 10:01 AM 4/22/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: chlebek@...
>
>
>
>Tip #1: You can drag inventory / equipment slots to your hot buttons the
>same way as any of the buttons (just left click and hold til it "comes
>off"). This allows you to manipulate your inventory from the normal
>interface screen without having to go to inventory. So what I do is have my
>weapon, shield and instruments all on the same button panel and can now
>switch back and forth while running, no problem.
>
>Taelin, Songweavers of Kelethin.
>
>
> Subject: [eqbards] Equipping weapon(s)/shield and
> instruments

<sacrificed for the greater good>
